definition: "Sennen" refers to the act of engaging in a specific traditional activity commonly associated with rural areas. It involves the skilled practice of tending to and caring for a specific type of animal in a specific setting. This activity is typically carried out by individuals who possess specialized knowledge and experience in this field.

examples.german: Ich senn(e) die Kühe auf der Alm.
examples.english: I herd the cows on the alpine pasture.
The female alpine herder milks the cows.

examples.german: Die Senner haben eine traditionelle Tracht.
examples.english: The alpine herders wear traditional costumes.

examples.german: Die Senner sind den ganzen Sommer auf der Alm.
examples.english: The alpine herders are on the alpine pasture all summer.
The female alpine herder produces cheese.
